name: Plan V - Organic Diabetic-Friendly Muscle Builder

Breakfast.details: Organic Low-Glycemic Breakfast Bowl: 2 organic eggs (scrambled), 1/2 cup organic black beans, 1/4 organic avocado, 1/2 cup organic mixed vegetables (spinach, bell peppers), 1 slice organic whole grain toast
Breakfast.instructions: Scramble eggs with vegetables. Serve with black beans, avocado, and whole grain toast.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic Greek Yogurt Parfait: 1 cup organic Greek yogurt, 1/4 cup organic mixed berries, 2 tbsp organic chopped walnuts, 1 tsp organic stevia (if needed)
Mid-Morning Snack.instructions: Layer yogurt with berries and top with walnuts. Sweeten with stevia if desired.

Lunch.details: Organic Grilled Chicken and Quinoa Salad: 5 oz organic grilled chicken breast, 1/2 cup cooked organic quinoa, 2 cups organic mixed greens, 1/4 cup organic cherry tomatoes, 2 tbsp organic olive oil and vinegar dressing
Lunch.instructions: Grill chicken. Mix quinoa, greens, and tomatoes. Top with chicken and dress with olive oil and vinegar.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Protein Shake: 1 scoop organic pea protein powder, 1 cup organic unsweetened almond milk, 1/2 organic cucumber, 1 tbsp organic chia seeds

Post-Workout Snack.details: Organic Turkey Roll-Ups: 3 oz organic turkey breast, 1 oz organic cheese, 1/4 organic avocado
Post-Workout Snack.instructions: Roll turkey slices with cheese and avocado inside.

Dinner.details: Organic Baked Cod with Broccoli and Sweet Potato: 6 oz organic baked cod, 1 cup organic steamed broccoli, 1/2 medium organic sweet potato, 1 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 organic lemon
Dinner.instructions: Bake cod. Steam broccoli. Bake sweet potato. Drizzle fish and vegetables with olive oil and lemon juice.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Cottage Cheese with Almonds: 1/2 cup organic cottage cheese, 2 tbsp organic sliced almonds, 1/4 tsp organic cinnamon
Evening Snack.instructions: Mix cottage cheese with almonds and sprinkle with cinnamon.
